description:
After meeting an untimely death, Tomokui Kanata is reincarnated as a lowly goblin, but he’s worked up a monstrous appetite. Thanks to his new ability that allows him to grow stronger the more he feeds, his feeble status quickly changes, and he rises to become the goblin leader. With a mix of his past memories, new body, and strong stomach, he’s taking a bite out of this new fantastical world!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

The episodes were streamed several days ahead than the TV broadcast on U-NEXT, Anime Houdai, and Crunchyroll beginning on April 2nd, 2024 at 0:00 JST. The regular TV broadcast begins on April 5th, 2024.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Parenthood
tags.description: Centers around the experience of raising a child.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Spearplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of spears in combat.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamayama800) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/山口宏_(脚本家%29)

He's Japanese screenwriter and novelist, and one of the founders of Studio [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/258364/)._

Affiliated with [Studio DEEN](https://anilist.co/studio/37/Studio-DEEN).
__Shuuhei Abe__ is a Japanese sound director and sound production manager.

**[Website](https://everdre.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@EverdreaM_official) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EverdreOfficial)**

**EverdreaM** is a Japanese music duo consist of Misato ([Misato Matsuoka](https://anilist.co/staff/149680/Misato-Matsuoka)) and Hitomi ([Hitomi Sekine](https://anilist.co/staff/191744/Hitomi-Sekine)).

Hwang Chan-sung (Korean: 황찬성, born February 11, 1990), also known mononymously as Chansung, is a South Korean singer, rapper, songwriter and actor. He is a member of the Korean boy band 2PM. He made his debut as an actor in the 2006 comedy series Unstoppable High Kick, and since then has gone on to star in the Japanese drama Kaitō Royale (2011) and 7th Grade Civil Servant (2013).

__Height:__ 176cm

Lee Chang-min (Korean: 이창민; born May 1, 1986), most often credited as Changmin, is a South Korean singer. He studied at Dong-ah Institute of Media and Arts and is the oldest member of the K-pop group 2AM. He was also a member of duo Homme, along with Lee Hyun.

Not to be confused with the voice actor of the [same name](https://anilist.co/staff/235423).
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).
